pageSetting.title: 职能部室考核进度查询明细

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct fapz.khnf,fapz.famc,dmms.dmms khzq,pffa.khqs,fapz.znbs, jg.jgmc znbsmc, wd.wdmc,xmpz.xmmc, case when xmpz.jsfs = '1' then '自动计算' else case when xmpz.jsfs = '2' then '自定义程序' else '在线打分' end end jsfs , case when xmpz.jflx = '1' then '打分者权重计分' else case when xmpz.jflx = '2' then '打分者平均得分' else case when xmpz.jflx = '3' then '打分者平均得分（去掉一个最高分，最低分）' else case when xmpz.jflx = '4' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均（去掉最高分，最低分)' else case when xmpz.jflx = '5' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均' else case when xmpz.jflx = '6' then '打分者平均得分（去掉两个最高分，两个最低分）' end end end end end end jflx , pffa.pjr,hy.hymc pjrmc,hygw.gwmc pjrgw, case when pffa.pfzt='0' then '未完成评分' else '已完成评分' end pfzt from znbs_zxpffa pffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on pffa.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join (select cast(dmz as integer) dmz,dmms from csb_dmms dmms where dmmc='KHZQ' )DMMS on DMMS.dmz=PFFA.KHZQ inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = fapz.znbs left join khdx_Hygw hygw on hygw.khdxdh = pffa.pjr and hygw.jsrq = 29991231 inner join khdx_hy hy on pffa.pjr = hy.khdxdh inner join znbs_khxmpz xmpz on fapz.fabh = xmpz.fabh inner join znbs_wdmb wd on xmpz.wdbh = wd.wdbh inner join znbs_khpjr khpjr on fapz.fabh =khpjr.fabh and khpjr.xmbh = xmpz.xmbh and khpjr.pjr = pffa.pjr where 1=1 and pffa.fabh = $fabh$ and fapz.khzq = $khzq$ and fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and pffa.khqs = $khqs$ and pffa.khdxdh in( $jgkhdxdh$) order by fapz.khnf,dmms.dmms,pffa.khqs,fapz.famc,fapz.znbs,wd.wdmc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select distinct fapz.khnf,fapz.famc,dmms.dmms khzq,pffa.khqs,fapz.znbs, jg.jgmc znbsmc, wd.wdmc,xmpz.xmmc, case when xmpz.jsfs = '1' then '自动计算' else case when xmpz.jsfs = '2' then '自定义程序' else '在线打分' end end jsfs , case when xmpz.jflx = '1' then '打分者权重计分' else case when xmpz.jflx = '2' then '打分者平均得分' else case when xmpz.jflx = '3' then '打分者平均得分（去掉一个最高分，最低分）' else case when xmpz.jflx = '4' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均（去掉最高分，最低分)' else case when xmpz.jflx = '5' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均' else case when xmpz.jflx = '6' then '打分者平均得分（去掉两个最高分，两个最低分）' end end end end end end jflx , pffa.pjr,hy.hymc pjrmc,hygw.gwmc pjrgw, case when pffa.pfzt='0' then '未完成评分' else '已完成评分' end pfzt from znbs_zxpffa pffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on pffa.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join (select cast(dmz as integer) dmz,dmms from csb_dmms dmms where dmmc='KHZQ' )DMMS on DMMS.dmz=PFFA.KHZQ inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = fapz.znbs left join khdx_Hygw hygw on hygw.khdxdh = pffa.pjr and hygw.jsrq = 29991231 inner join khdx_hy hy on pffa.pjr = hy.khdxdh inner join znbs_khxmpz xmpz on fapz.fabh = xmpz.fabh inner join znbs_wdmb wd on xmpz.wdbh = wd.wdbh inner join znbs_khpjr khpjr on fapz.fabh =khpjr.fabh and khpjr.xmbh = xmpz.xmbh and khpjr.pjr = pffa.pjr where 1=1 and pffa.fabh = $fabh$ and fapz.khzq = $khzq$ and fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and pffa.khqs = $khqs$ and pffa.khdxdh in( $jgkhdxdh$) order by fapz.khnf,dmms.dmms,pffa.khqs,fapz.famc,fapz.znbs,wd.wdmc ) t
